thi-ap2:0.3_0: Meanwhile, I was injured by those seniors,
thi-ap2:1.3_0: I’ve been given to my father;
thi-ap2:2.2_0: and again all my future lives.
thi-ap2:2.3_0: the sage has reached the world,
thi-ap2:3.2_0: Whatever of me was to say,
thi-ap2:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
thi-ap2:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
thi-ap2:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
thi-ap2:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by me.
